title: covert magnetic channel
extract: A covert channel is a type of computer attack that allows the communication of information by transferring objects through existing information channels or networks using the structure of the existing medium to convey the data in small parts. ... Covert channels have been used to steal data from highly secure systems.
extract_html: A covert channel is a type of computer attack that allows the communication of information by transferring objects through existing information channels or networks using the structure of the existing medium to convey the data in small parts. ...
